basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a developer in the San Francisco bay area, driven by technical projects that offer meaningful solutions for complex world challenges. I currently work in the renewable energy industry, where I focus on customer facing web products. I enjoy working in teams that nourish curiosity and continuous learning. In my past life, before programming, I was a researcher, working on politics and anthropology in east Africa.
